    • About Deepak Gupta


    When buying or selling a home you want results and with Deepak Gupta and his professionally trained “Dee Team” that is what you get. At the “The Dee Team” we look to exceed your expectations whether you are looking to buy, sell or invest. We pride in making a personalized partnership with each and every one of our clients to help them reach their goals.
